# Introduction
- the inclusion of WTI Midland (from June 2023)
  - Brent partials: 100,000-barrel part-cargoes in the physical/forward market.
  - Contracts for Difference or CFDs: swaps between Dated Brent and forward Brent (weekly)
  - Dated to Front Line or DFLs: swaps between Dated Brent and the futures front month Brent settlements (monthly)
  - Exchange of Futures for Swaps or EFS
